comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Veterans of the American Civil War, and we'd love to have your photo added to the group.

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Here is article about Stewart Woodford en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stewart_Woodford In this NYTimes article the Times identifies him as: "General Stewart L. Woodford, former Minister to Spain, Civil War soldier, Lieutenant Governor of New York State, United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York and a prominent figure for many years in the Republican Party." (He died in 1913). select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F50D1EF83B58177A...

comment._content: Thanks for the information. We'll add a note to the source catalog.
